item.description:
Designers Group is a collaboration between Fashion 2010 and the Boston Fashion Meetup Group This group is for designers, organizers and assistant organizers only.
Designers Susan Hurst and Lucy Chen, from Shirley Willett's Boston Design Lab, will talk about the the pros and cons of the present fashion market; the many design considerations for their target consumers (that they are collaborating on); fabric sourcing problems; the possibilities in production of “one-offs” versus mass production; and the all important costing versus market prices.
We will be continuing our discussion about Direct Selling. We also discussed the possibility of planning a trunk show at the last Designers Group and we will talk more about this. There will also be time for networking.
item.name: Designers Group-"Preparing To Sell"
